thread.title: See the pictures of David Tennant and Ricky Wilson as Kiki Dee and Elton John
thread.title_full: See the pictures of David Tennant and Ricky Wilson as Kiki Dee and Elton John

title: See the pictures of David Tennant and Ricky Wilson as Kiki Dee and Elton John
text:
See the pictures of David Tennant and Ricky Wilson as Kiki Dee and Elton John See the pictures of David Tennant and Ricky Wilson as Kiki Dee and Elton John 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Former Doctor Who star David Tennant is kicking off Sky 1′s latest show in style: dressed as Elton John’s other half, Kiki Dee, from the duet Don’t Go Breaking My Heart. (Justin Downing/Sky One/PA) 
David joins Bring The Noise’s host, Kaiser Chiefs frontman Ricky Wilson, who dons a wig and suit to portray Sir Elton. 
Former X Factor judge Nicole Scherzinger and singer Tinie Tempah are team captains on the entertainment show, which will feature live performances and celebrity guests each week. (Justin Downing/Sky One/PA) 
Nicole told David, a guest on the first episode: “David, you look pretty as a girl…” 
Ricky, who is also a coach on BBC’s The Voice, said: “I’m no stranger to music based TV shows with a competitive element, but this is taking music TV to another level. 
“Swing by the off licence, phone for a takeaway, and settle in with Bring The Noise.” (Justin Downing/Sky One/PA) 
Sky 1′s Bring The Noise starts on 22 October at 9pm. Promoted Stories
